articles.author: Ed Zitron
articles.title: Employees should stop working so hard. It's better for workers and companies
articles.description: Managers should value workers based on output, not hours logged. Being more efficient will make employees happier — and the company more productive.

articles.title: Now is the perfect time to ask for a raise. Here's how to do it.
articles.description: Picking when to ask for a raise can be just as important as asking how to get a raise, career coaches and executives told Insider.

Growth is slowing; inflation is rising; and layoffs are happening. In other words, it's a perfect time to ask for a raise.

articles.title: GOP governors worry Trump 2024 run will cost them in midterms: Hogan
articles.description: Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan said "it's going to cost us seats" if Trump announces a run, adding: "After all, he lost to Joe Biden, which is hard to do."

articles.author: Jordan Pandy, Kelsey Neubauer
articles.title: 7 people share why they moved out of Florida: costs, weather, and more
articles.description: Florida was the No. 1 state for Americans moving in 2021. But brutal heat, high housing costs, and low wages are why people are ditching it, too.

articles.title: Lowe's adopts 4-day workweeks after worker complaints
articles.description: Employees said they sometimes had to work six straight days to get a weekend off. The home-improvement chain is now rolling out 4-day workweeks.
